__TOC__

Currently we have 

* blue (usplash, logo)
* steel (gdm greeter)
* green (desktop background)
* tango aluminium
 
- brown (while gdm loads)

So unless there are other ideas these 3 colors are the porposed ones to participate in the poll. 
However to not only vote for an idea only we will need to have implemented (using those colors): 

* logo
* usplash
* gdm greeter 
* wallpaper 

 - Preferably being exaclty identical except the color shades themselves <<BR>>
 - The wallpaper can have a transparent background <<BR>>
 - It would be better to attach svg files too <<BR>>
 - size small: 64x64 (#convert image.png -resize 64 image-small.png) <<BR>>
